actions.text: Amendment SA 6482 under the order of 11/28/2022, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 359.
Amendment SA 6482 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 6487. (consideration: CR S6834-6837, S6841-6844 ; text: CR S6834-6835) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6482 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 6487.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 6482 under the order of 11/28/2022, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 359.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 6482 under the order of 11/28/2022, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 359.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.
